address.streetAddress: 9 Vanley Crescent Servicing Greater Toronto Area & Surrounding Areas

description:
Evolve Limousine has more than a decade experience of transporting Tourists. Book your next trip with Evolve and receive the best chauffeur service available. We do pick ups anywhere in Toronto. Specializing in Airport pickups and drop offs, tours, personal chauffeuring and more. #1 Recommended Limousine Service. Book now.

For Every Ride We Plant Trees. Increasing our Environmental Impact.

reviews.title: Reliable, professional servie
text: Thank you Evolve Limousine for your top-notch service.  Richard, you helped make my daughter’s Prom a memorable event with the outstanding customer-focused service. Your commitment to excellence truly impressed me, and I wholeheartedly recommend your services. I will definitely book Evolve Limousine again.

reviews.title: Wedding + Airport Review
text: I recently booked Evolve Limousine for my wedding in March and everything was perfect. Richard was our driver and he arrived before the scheduled time and we got to our destination on time. Richard was professional about everything and I would book him again. I also booked Evolve for a trip to the airport and everything went great. I will be using this service again in the future. Thanks

reviews.title: Solo Trip to Pearson Airport
text: I booked with Evolve Limousine through my stay at Hotel X for a ride back to Pearson Airport. The driver was polite at first, but as we hit traffic very arrogant and started an issue because I wanted to put down the window. He locked all the windows and proceeded to ignore me. I felt afraid for my safety. When I arrived he put on his sunglasses and got out and opened the door very aggressively. Highly do not recommend this service. 0/10

reviews.title: Best experience
text: Evolve limousine was perfect Farid went way above the normal driver he was friendly and pleasant he was also early for the pickup
Hands down best experience I ever had & highly recommend

reviews.title: Reliable and green
text: Used them for airport runs for work and never had an issue. Really like the EV aspect since I work for a green based company. Hope to see their fleet grow

reviews.title: Excellent service!!
text: A fantastic experience from start to finish. My driver Ryan was an absolute pleasure to deal with, he was very friendly and professional for our trip to Niagara Falls! He arrived on time and the vehicle was spotless! I highly recommend Evolve Limousine service and I will definitely be using them again!

reviews.title: Professional and clean
text: Professional service. Such a clean and beautiful ride. Richard was great to work with. Using a green car service is a huge part of me reducing my carbon  foot print.

reviews.title: Good Vibes and Fun Times
text: Excellent service from Evolve. We use the service to go to Niagara Falls for a tour and wine tasting. Very comfortable, driver was very friendly and even let us connect to the Bluetooth to jam out the whole ride. Definitely a great service for travellers.

reviews.title: Amazing experience!!!
text: 10/10 experience with Evolve Limousine. Great service . Awesome staff . I Definitely would recommend

reviews.title: Smooth Ride!
text: I had a really good experience with Evolve Limousine. They provide transparent communication; exceptional service and the overall process was very smooth. They are truly professionals in the work they do. I would definitely use this service again and would highly recommend this company to friends and family.

reviews.title: Clean and professional !
text: High quality vehicles, Tesla’s are my favourite!
Friendly customer service, I would recommend to my family and friends.

reviews.title: Amazing Experience and Exceptional Service
text: It was simple to book and the company assured me they would give my daughter the " Ultimate Tesla experience " for her birthday as the Tesla Model X is her dream vehicle. The company went above and beyond to do just that. The driver Richard was prompt and professional and gave us a thorough Tesla features demonstration which was exactly what I asked for. Richard displayed such amazing knowledge of the vehicle and comparisons to other high end vehicles and readily answered all of our questions. This was an amazing birthday and I would highly recommend this company!

reviews.title: Amazing and reliable service
text: I had a last minute flight to catch and within 10 minutes, a Teslasine driver was at my doorstep ready to go. The driver is very professional and will get you to your destination safely. Their vehicles are spacious, clean, and environmentally friendly. I would definitely recommend everyone to consider taking an eco-friendly transportation service.

reviews.title: Friendly Staff and Fast Service
text: I had a flight to the airport I had to make for a family trip in which I needed plenty of space for my luggage. Contacting them and scheduling a time was a breeze. This was my first time riding in a Tesla and it was a very smooth ride! Very impressed. I will definitely be using this service again in the future.

reviews.title: Best Limousine Experience in Toronto
text: I booked with Evolve Limousine and it was the best experience I have ever had with a limousine company. I usually travel with my friends and family so i needed a vehicle that could accommodate 4 adults. I called Evolve Limousine and they told me their whole fleet was electric, so cool! I booked a full size sedan but hey upgraded my booking from a Tesla Model S to Model X at no charge because I was a first time customer. We were picked up in a spacious SUV with the falcon doors that go up looking like wings. The ride was smooth, comfortable and so luxurious. Our driver was very friendly and demonstrated all the interesting features of the car. I got to say that I will only be booking with Evolve Limousine because of their 5 star service and their electric vehicles which are good for their clients and the environment. Thanks Again Evolve Limousine!

reviews.title: 10/10 Would Recommend This Service!
text: Kenneth was a wonderful and accommodating driver who provided us with some great recommendations. We will definitely be booking this service again in the near future! 10/10 would recommend this service!

reviews.title: Airport ride
text: Had to book a ride to the airport last minute and they were able to accommodate! On time and amazing service, would highly recommend booking with them!

reviews.title: Awesome ride
text: Amazing service! Our drive was smooth, on time and safe. Paying in advance made the process much easier. The Tesla was as advertised 10/10.

reviews.title: Prompt, smooth, comfortable
text: Really appreciate having a reliable EV limo service in town. My favorite way to get to and from the airport, prompt, smooth, comfortable. And the advance payment and gratuity is very convenient, when you have a million other things to keep track of while traveling.

reviews.title: Tesla Treat!
text: Booking was easy , with prompt reply.
Our Tesla trip was a surprise for our son who absolutely loves Tesla’s!
Richard was our driver who made the trip extra fun for us, showing us the Tesla fun stuff. Thanks Richard! We will see you next time 😀
We would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Wow
text: Wow, what an experience. Picked up from the airport by Richard was amazing. Our flight was delayed a couple of hours but Evolve kept up to date with our timings, Richard (our driver), let me know where he was parked and as soon as we walked out of the doors, he noticed us and put our bags in the back whilst we settled ourselves into the Tesla. Richard was so welcoming, extremely helpful and gave us recommendations on where to eat and what to do. He went absolutely above and beyond… as our flight was delayed, we only had approx 1 hour to get to the hotel and then to the Scotiabank arena for the Leafs game. He could tell we were panicking so he offered to wait outside the hotel for us and then take us directly outside the arena!!! This helped us massively otherwise we could have missed the first game! Honestly, if it wasn’t for Richard then I don’t know what we would have done. He was amazing from start to finish. If I ever come back to Toronto then I will 100% be asking for him as my driver again!!

reviews.title: Amazing trip!
text: Great company. Great service. Great experience. I will never use any other company besides this one for all future rides going anywhere.

reviews.title: Best Service Ever~~
text: SO I just want to thank Evolve Limousine so much for their services!
They were so accommdating to us when our church moved our ceremony up 2 hours!! I am so grateful that they were able to do that for us!
Our driver was Richard and he was amazing, he was so nice and kind and sociable!!!  He was on time to pick up my parents and I on the wedding day and he was so polite and he was a great driver!!

We went with a Telsa Model X post ceremony so my new husband and I could have a minute to ourselves!! Richard was the best driver we could have asked for - we even stopped at a harvey's drive thru for a quick bite!! He was very accommodating. We really enjoyed having the Tesla and all of our guests loved it as well - everyone kept admiring it and saying it was so cool that we got it for our wedding day!! We had the best time taking photos with the Tesla! It is such a fun car (Richard even gave our photographer some cools ideas of what to shoot with the Tesla!!)

If you and your uture spouse to be are looking for a nice car to leave the cereomy  and to take photos with get a Tesla - It was awesome and so worth it...thank you Evolve and Richard for everything!!!!!

reviews.title: Great service from a great company!
text: What a great service from Richard and his team! Also such an awesome business - all the best, always!

reviews.title: Wonderful exceptional service
text: Impeccable service from Richard and Evolve Limousines. We are a family of four and had 5 suitcases. We were surprised that they all fit in the Tesla model X. We had never been in a Tesla before and had organised transfers from and to the airport and a trip Niagara Falls. We had Richard as our driver for our entire trip. He was amazing and knowledgeable about Toronto and surrounding areas and was helpful in recommending places to visit. Also happy to take us anywhere we wished. Highly recommend.
